resources.string: Prothom Alo is the highest circulated and most read newspaper in Bangladesh. Visit Prothom Alo English website for News ranging from local to international, entertainment to technology, Weather to sports.

The Daily Star is the largest circulating daily English-language newspaper in Bangladesh. The online version of The Daily Star as a leading English daily newspaper of Bangladesh is updating 24/7 with latest, breaking, politics, business, technology, world, entertainment, sports, lifestyle and crime news.
The latest in Bangladesh News and World News from TheIndependent, Bangladesh. Visit The Independent for all sort of Local and International News.
